data.eml:eml: The millipede family Diplomaragnidae in Taiwan, with descriptions of nine new species (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mikhaljova, Elena V., Golovatch, Sergei I., Chang, Hseuh-Wen (2010): The millipede family Diplomaragnidae in Taiwan, with descriptions of nine new species (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida). Zootaxa 2615: 23-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197896
